content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. For example, you received an error when trying to insert coal into the furnace when you had none in your inventory.

### Errors when inserting items into an entity that cannot accept them
- Make sure to check if there is a nearby entity that can accept the items you are trying to insert. You received an error when attempting to insert copper plates into a furnace that was not configured to accept them.
